description: This file implements Diffie-Hellman (DH) cryptographic functions for TLS, including key generation, encapsulation, decapsulation, and shared secret agreement. It contains functions for processing DH public keys, generating key pairs, and establishing shared secrets within the TLS protocol context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecapDHPublicKey(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * dh_key,ANSC_ASN1_INT ** dh_prime,ANSC_ASN1_INT ** dh_generator,ANSC_ASN1_INT ** dh_public)
methods.description: Decodes a DH public key into its components: prime, generator, and public value from an ASN.1 encoded key structure.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE TlsCpoEncapDHPublicKey(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_ASN1_INT * dh_prime,ANSC_ASN1_INT * dh_generator,ANSC_ASN1_INT * dh_public)
methods.description: Encodes the DH prime, generator, and public value into an ASN.1 structure representing the public key.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoGenerateDHKeys1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY ** dh_pub_key,ANSC_X509_KEY ** dh_prv_key)
methods.description: Generates a DH key pair using a default group (Oakley group 2).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoGenerateDHKeys2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_ASN1_INT * dh_prime,ANSC_ASN1_INT * dh_generator,ANSC_X509_KEY ** dh_pub_key,ANSC_X509_KEY ** dh_prv_key)
methods.description: Generates a DH key pair using specified prime and generator values.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoAgreeDHSecret(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * dh_pub_key1,ANSC_X509_KEY * dh_pub_key2,ANSC_X509_KEY * dh_prv_key1,PUCHAR shared_secret,PULONG secret_size)
methods.description: Completes Diffie-Hellman key exchange by computing the shared secret given local private and remote public keys.

ctags.name: TlsCpoAgreeDHSecret
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_X509_KEY * dh_pub_key1,ANSC_X509_KEY * dh_pub_key2,ANSC_X509_KEY * dh_prv_key1,PUCHAR shared_secret,PULONG secret_size)
